title: The Super “Dog Food” System - Novel Updates
author: Di Yang   帝阳
description: Get prizes for PDA? And the prizes are treasures from games？Get stuff for free by showing PDA? Even get stuff like cultivation manuals and secret weapons？Ever since he got the Super Dog Food system, Ye Tian's life is awesome—all he does is spread Dog Food (PDA in Chinese）with beautiful women.>
